channel.title: Help with windows media center
channel.description: hi iv just installed windows mesia center on my computer but i cant haer anything. and my friend gave me a audio driver for windows home and pro and i cant use it for media. dos anyone have a audio driver for windows media center? if yea can u plz send me the link to download or something

is thier a program i can use for an onbored sound?

item.title: Help with windows media center
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

1 hit kill:

hi iv just installed windows mesia center on my computer but i cant haer anything. and my friend gave me a audio driver for windows home and pro and i cant use it for media. dos anyone have a audio driver for windows media center? if yea can u plz send me the link to download or something

You need a sound card with the correct driver for the sound card installed.

Read full topic
